text: The Broadgate Tower is a skyscraper in London's main financial district, the City of London. It was constructed between 2005 and 2009. File:Broadgate Tower under construction 1-5-07 retouched.jpg|The Broadgate Tower under construction in early 2007. File:Broadgate tower dec2007.jpg|Broadgate Tower in December 2007 ==References== * Official website * 201 Bishopsgate and the Broadgate Tower on SOM.com * Webcam Category:Skyscrapers in the United Kingdom Category:Buildings and structures in the City of London
title: Broadgate Tower
